Source.Name: cryptsetup
Source.Summary: Utility to setup disk encryption using DMCrypt
Source.Description: Cryptsetup is utility used to conveniently setup disk encryption based on DMCrypt kernel module. These include plain dm-crypt volumes, LUKS volumes, loop-AES and TrueCrypt (including VeraCrypt extension) format. Project also includes veritysetup utility used to conveniently setup DMVerity block integrity checking kernel module.
